What can I do?

If you donâ€™t already, you should be using Blue bins and Yellow wheelie bins, and be putting them out for Kerbside collection on the designated days for your area. You should also use a LoveNZ public recycling bin when possible and make sure to correctly deposit the types of rubbish into their respective bins. When you buy a new electronic device, ask the supplier if they will take your old electronic device for recycling. Some distributors are starting to realise this is an add-on service they can offer customers. Consumers can create the demand for recycling through their purchasing decisions, and place the responsibility for recycling on the producers where it belongs.
